attributes.action: Make School PE Lessons Non-Compulsory During GCSE Period (Year 9, 10 & 11)
attributes.additional_details: I think that PE lessons in schools should be Non-Compulsory during the GCSE period, (Year 9, Year 10 & Year 11) This is because PE is nonessentialy taking up two hours a week that could be otherwise spent doing GCSE Subject( that are actually useful in life, unlike PE)
